sentence.Network_en: Frank Deford is a special correspondent for Newsweek magazine.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗兰克·德福特是《新闻周刊》杂志的特派记者。

sentence.Network_en: Our economics correspondent, James Morgan, is just back from Germany.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的财经记者詹姆斯·摩根刚刚从德国回来。

sentence.Network_en: From Nairobi here's our East Africa correspondent, Colin Blane.
sentence.Network_cn: 以下是来自内罗毕东非记者科林·布兰的报道。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective): from Old French correspondant or medieval Latin correspondent- 'corresponding', from the verb correspondere (see correspond)

entry.tran: (尤指专门报道某一类新闻的)记者，通讯员
entry.def: A correspondent is a newspaper or television journalist, especially one who specializes in a particular type of news.

example.tran: 我们的外交通讯员马克·布雷恩

means.word_mean: 1. someone who communicates by means of letters
2. a journalist employed to provide news stories for newspapers or broadcast media
1. similar or correspondent in some respects though otherwise dissimilar;

sentences.sentence: "brains and computers are often considered analogous"
"surimi is marketed as analogous to crabmeat"

auth_sentence.content: Our correspondent reports on what is behind the tension.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our correspondent reports on what is behind the tension.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our correspondent reports on what is behind the tension.

auth_sentence.content: National correspondent Jim Malone has the latest from Washington.
auth_sentence.res_content: National correspondent Jim Malone has the latest from Washington.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: National correspondent Jim Malone has the latest from Washington.

auth_sentence.content: Reuters and Correspondent Cynthia Tornquist contributed to this report.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reuters and Correspondent Cynthia Tornquist contributed to this report.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reuters and Correspondent Cynthia Tornquist contributed to this report.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,通常表示"……人",也可以表示其他具体物.; 3. 表名词,"……药剂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: excel优胜,超越+ent……的→excellent卓越的,极好的
insist坚持+ent……的→adj.坚持的;逼人注意的
sent感觉+i+ent……的→adj.有知觉的,知悉的
sil+ent……的→adj.寂静的,沉默的,无声的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+i+ent……的→adj.短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的
deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
correspond通信+ent……人→n.记者,通讯员;通信者
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [大中学校的]学生;研究者,学者

stems_affixes.word_buile: deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
re再+ag做+ent……药剂→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂

sentences.en: They said foreign correspondents who stayed too long in a place went blind.
sentences.cn: 他们说, 驻外记者在一个地方待得太久就变得不能发现新事物了。

jushi.english: They said foreign correspondents who stayed too long in a place went blind.
jushi.chinese: 他们说驻外记者在一个地方呆得太久就变得不能发现新事物了。
